title: Add debounce on task pickup for race condition prevention
description:
Add optional debounce to prevent race conditions when human is still editing:

```bash
ticker run --auto --debounce 2s  # Wait 2s before picking up newly available tasks
```

Implementation:
```go
func (e *Engine) getNextTaskWithDebounce() (*ticks.Task, error) {
    task, err := e.ticks.NextTask(e.epicID)
    if err != nil || task == nil {
        return task, err
    }
    
    if e.config.DebounceInterval > 0 {
        // Task just became available - wait for potential follow-up edits
        time.Sleep(e.config.DebounceInterval)
        
        // Re-fetch to get any updates (human might have added notes)
        return e.ticks.GetTask(task.ID)
    }
    
    return task, nil
}
```

This prevents race conditions like:
1. Human runs: tk reject abc123
2. Ticker picks up task (awaiting cleared)
3. Human runs: tk note abc123 "feedback"
4. Agent misses the feedback

With debounce, ticker waits for human to finish editing.

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] --debounce flag configures wait time
- [ ] Re-fetches task after debounce
- [ ] Default is no debounce (backwards compat)
- [ ] Short debounce (1-2s) recommended for safety
